structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Dispositions Or Offerings For Which Public Offering Statement Or Other Materials Not Required

text.section: Sections thirty-six to fifty-five, inclusive, shall apply to all time-shares subject to this chapter except as provided in subsection (b).
Neither a public offering statement nor the materials required by section forty-two need be prepared or delivered in the case of:
a gratuitous disposition of a time-share;
a disposition pursuant to court order;
a disposition by a government or governmental agency;
a disposition by foreclosure or deed in lieu of foreclosure;
a disposition that may be cancelled at any time and for any reason by the purchaser without penalty;

a disposition of a time-share in a unit situated wholly outside the commonwealth pursuant to a contract executed wholly outside the commonwealth, if there has been no offering within the commonwealth;
an offering by a developer of time-shares in no more than one time-share unit at any one time; or
A disposition of a time-share property or all time-shares therein to one purchaser.
